solution_line_template: The cost of the keyboard was {keyboard_multiplier} * ${mouse_cost} = $<<{keyboard_multiplier}*{mouse_cost}={keyboard_cost}>>{keyboard_cost}.
That means Fabian had to pay ${keyboard_cost} + ${mouse_cost} = $<<{keyboard_cost}+{mouse_cost}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} in total for his accessories.
